title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The Share of respondents of Response Passport is 2.5% smaller than the maximum value at Smartphone.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The Share of respondents of Response Passport is 2.5% smaller than the maximum value at Smartphone.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 10.0 is found at Response Smartphone and the minimum is found at Passport where Response is 4.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Credit card.
There is a difference of 6.0 between the maximum Response Smartphone and minimum Response Passport.
Share of respondents at Response Smartphone is 10.0 , second place is Credit card at 9.0, and thirdly is Debit card at 8.0.
The average Share of respondents in all 5 Responses is 7.4.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 37.0.
